0e1b7e7b-031b-4e66-be0b-c2ccb60cdba2.title: Wordle
0e1b7e7b-031b-4e66-be0b-c2ccb60cdba2.description:
Wordle in Scrap Mechanic!

The rules are simple: You have 6 tries to guess a 5 letter word.
The letters can be highlighted in 3 colours:
-#00ff00Green#919191: The letter is in the word, and in the right place
-#ffff00Yellow#919191: The letter is in the word, but not in the right place
-Grey: The letter is not in the word
